text: @BarackObama @CDCgov You bet @BarackObama, for the 3-24 days the infected are asymptomatic with #covid19 spreading the #coronavirus we will absolutely nor wear masks because U and the dems have what's best in mind. We could wait until thousands die before we change our minds. Good job!!
